messages.title: A personal message from Steen Parish
messages.content: I will work to help build a more equitable and sustainable Scotland. We must embrace the renewable energy revolution and invest more in our young people's education, well-being and training opportunities...

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Supporting Green Jobs in West, Not Coal or Incinerators
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plans against the new coal economy and against incineration...

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Manufacturing and Small Business, Not Aid for Multinational Companies
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Strong local businesses committed to the region, including in manufacturing, not companies that stay only until the grant money runs out...

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Invest in Public Transport and Cycling, Not Airport or Motorway Expansion
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Restore bus regulation, essential for rural parts of West in particular, and to renationalise ScotiaRail...
Fair taxes to invest in public services, no fees - keep tuition free, cut fuel bills, insulate every home.

issues.economy: We need strong local businesses committed to the region...
issues.environment: Supporting Green Jobs in West, Not Coal or Incinerators

housing.content: Cut fuel bills, insulate every home

leaflet.personalStatement: I've been campaigning against nuclear weapons since the 1980s.
